text: ya maeshar almuminin adhkuruu niemat allah taealaa alty 'aneamaha ealaykum fi "almdyn" 'ayam ghzwt al'ahzab -why ghzwt alkhndq-, hin aijtamae ealaykum almushrikun min kharij "almdyn", walyhwd walmnafqwn min "almdyn" wama hwlha, fahatu bkm, fa'arsalna ealaa al'ahzab ryhana shadidat aqtlet khyamhm wrmt qdwrhm, wa'arsalna malayikat min alsama' lm trwha, fawaqae alrueb fi qlwbhm. wakan allah bima taemalun bsyrana, la yakhfaa ealayh min dhlk shy'
